title: Get-Paid.com
author: Get-Paid.com
created_time: November 09, 2022, 04:50:06 AMLast edit: November 09, 2022, 05:28:08 AM by Get-Paid.com
content: So as the title explains - there is a $174 from affiliate commissions sitting in the account:The thing is the site allows to withdraw it only via a local Nigerian bank account - which is something none of us have  There is no option to exchange it.Checking LocalBitcoins - sellers give you 50% worth of Bitcoin for 76,600 NGN, so it's not worth it.One option is to bet with this amount on odds of 6.00 or so in some sports, then bet $1000 on 1.14 or so - hoping the favored outcome will occur and then you withdraw the $1000 + winnings from the other site.But perhaps you guys have better suggestions how to withdraw this?

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: What about Binance P2P?and there is a member from Nigeria who is very trusted CryptopreneurBrainboss, he have an exchange service, from Altcoins to Nigerian Bank Accounts, indeed it is not for the service you need but maybe with proportional fee he is willing to help you, just wanted to let you know, and also not knowing if withdrawing from a gambling site directly to a bank account in nigeria is safe, hope you can withdraw the money.

comments.author: Get-Paid.com
comments.created_time: November 09, 2022, 08:15:25 AMLast edit: November 09, 2022, 10:27:55 AM by Get-Paid.com
comments.body: Quote from: Strongkored on November 09, 2022, 07:58:03 AMWhat about Binance P2P?and there is a member from Nigeria who is very trusted CryptopreneurBrainboss, he have an exchange service, from Altcoins to Nigerian Bank Accounts, indeed it is not for the service you need but maybe with proportional fee he is willing to help you, just wanted to let you know, and also not knowing if withdrawing from a gambling site directly to a bank account in nigeria is safe, hope you can withdraw the money.Thanks for the 2 suggestions.Believe it or not - we've never heard of Binance P2P before, thanks for this suggestion.Likewise, PM sent to CryptopreneurBrainboss, let's see if he's willing to help, no problem if not

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Strongkored on November 09, 2022, 07:58:03 AMWhat about Binance P2P?and there is a member from Nigeria who is very trusted CryptopreneurBrainboss, he have an exchange service, from Altcoins to Nigerian Bank Accounts, indeed it is not for the service you need but maybe with proportional fee he is willing to help you, just wanted to let you know, and also not knowing if withdrawing from a gambling site directly to a bank account in nigeria is safe, hope you can withdraw the money.I find this interesting are all affiliates of BC.GAME have the same issue if they are not from Nigeria and you can withdraw your earnings using a Nigerian Bank only, quite unfair to affiliate like you if they only have this option, knowing this, will promoters will likely promote BC.game if the withdrawal option is limited to a Nigerian Bank, hope Brainboss can help you with this and do update us for the development of your case.

comments.author: Get-Paid.com
comments.created_time: November 09, 2022, 09:41:44 AMLast edit: November 09, 2022, 10:07:43 AM by Get-Paid.com
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on November 09, 2022, 08:28:30 AMI find this interesting are all affiliates of BC.GAME have the same issue if they are not from Nigeria and you can withdraw your earnings using a Nigerian Bank only, quite unfair to affiliate like you if they only have this option, knowing this, will promoters will likely promote BC.game if the withdrawal option is limited to a Nigerian Bank, hope Brainboss can help you with this and do update us for the development of your case.Well ... yes, it seems to be the case, in the past they did allow you to exchange NGN to Crypto so you didn't have to deal with it, but at the moment it's not possible on their site.Just keeping you updated the withdrawal request has been submitted on their site - also it's not $174 - apparently the Nigerian government is manipulating the value of its currency, so it's worth only $94 - check this link for example:https://www.binance.com/en/trade/USDT_NGN?theme=dark&type=spotIt shows $818.1 so 76600 NGN is $93.64 at the momemnt.On Yahoo/XE it would show $440.A trade link was also created here:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5200468.msg61262649#msg61262649Crypto received from CryptopreneurBrainboss with thanks by the way!

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on November 09, 2022, 04:50:06 AMThe thing is the site allows to withdraw it only via a local Nigerian bank account - which is something none of us have  Maybe you can contact some community members who are living in Nigeria, maybe some of them are managers or ask in local board, and they can help you converting NGN to Bitcoin or some other crypto.They can withdraw NGN to their bank account and send you whatever you want, maybe with small fee for doing this service.I don't understand how can BC.game make this pay off only in NGN currency

comments.author: Get-Paid.com
comments.body: Quote from: notblox1 on November 09, 2022, 10:04:07 AMMaybe you can contact some community members who are living in Nigeria, maybe some of them are managers or ask in local board, and they can help you converting NGN to Bitcoin or some other crypto.They can withdraw NGN to their bank account and send you whatever you want, maybe with small fee for doing this service.I don't understand how can BC.game make this pay off only in NGN currency  Thanks, it was already done as posted above (you probably posted exactly when we posted).Some users from Nigeria can deposit NGN into BC.game directly using a bank transfer, this way they don't need to exchange their money to Crypto - so it's easier for them.If you're an affiliate - then yes, it could make you get stuck with this currency, but thankfully there are enough good people in this community who are happy to exchange for you.

comments.author: MainIbem
comments.body: Sorry to asked, have you found any help so far.. if no then I can help out any escrow is acceptable otherwise I suggest as earlier mention to contact brainboss.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: I want to believe you are not a Nigerian, because if you are, then withdrawing this money shouldnt be a problem at all, as in Nigeria today, you can even open a bank account with zero balance.If you are not a Nigerian, then it simply means a Nigerian signed up on bc.game with your referral link, which explains the naira commission..Withdrawing this money is something I can easily assist you with, but I will suggest you contact CryptopreneurBrainboss for help since he is a more trusted member of this community, he will have to withdraw the money to his Nigerian bank and account and send you the equivalent worth in bitcoin or usdt or your preferred crypto coin..

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Glad that people here sent help towards our fellow member. Special thanks to CryptoBrainBoss but since I have no idea if you have access in Binance (as one of the options), I would also consider your second option which is to use it on another platform to somehow form a bridge, if that's my case. The only problem is that your desired amount to withdraw would be at risk if you would use it for gambling purposes but indeed there would be chances of making it bigger.Considering the risk, that's not to best option. Escrows would work but you need to find the best one with credentials because there are fake ones out there for sure.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Well, you can exchange NGN for cryptocurrency not only on Binance P2pP, you can also do it on Bybit P2P there is also such an opportunity, it is safer and easier than a private exchange where you depend on the honesty of the buyer.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on November 09, 2022, 04:50:06 AMThe thing is the site allows to withdraw it only via a local Nigerian bank account - which is something none of us have  Really? My first time to see a website who accepts international affiliate people yet only accept a specific payment option, worst it's a local bank account for the affiliate to withdraw. This seems like a must avoid affiliate platform. Thanks for sharing this information too.Quote from: MainIbem on November 13, 2022, 06:31:18 PMSorry to asked, have you found any help so far.. if no then I can help out any escrow is acceptable otherwise I suggest as earlier mention to contact brainboss.The transaction made already with the help of CryptopreneurBrainboss, see quoted message below.Quote from: Get-Paid.com on November 09, 2022, 09:41:44 AMCrypto received from CryptopreneurBrainboss with thanks by the way!

comments.author: Fishy001
comments.body: Bc.game have exchange currencies on the site try it. Is it profitable casino affiliate?

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Strongkored on November 09, 2022, 07:58:03 AMWhat about Binance P2P?and there is a member from Nigeria who is very trusted CryptopreneurBrainboss, he have an exchange service, from Altcoins to Nigerian Bank Accounts, indeed it is not for the service you need but maybe with proportional fee he is willing to help you, just wanted to let you know, and also not knowing if withdrawing from a gambling site directly to a bank account in nigeria is safe, hope you can withdraw the money.I think there is no way to make the transaction via Binance P2P also I do not think CryptopreneurBrainboss would be able to help the OP. As the site only accept Nigerian bank and if CryptopreneurBrainboss or others wants to help then that would be able to come true if they have the same bank account name as bc.game which might have not.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: Daltonik on November 14, 2022, 08:23:50 AMWell, you can exchange NGN for cryptocurrency not only on Binance P2pP, you can also do it on Bybit P2P there is also such an opportunity, it is safer and easier than a private exchange where you depend on the honesty of the buyer.There many options available, i personally use Remitano, being using them since 2017, it is another convenient place to exchange naira to any other crypto currency and vice versa through the Swap feature or P2p, which ever the the user prefer.Quote from: shasan on November 17, 2022, 07:05:16 PMQuote from: Strongkored on November 09, 2022, 07:58:03 AM~Snip~I think there is no way to make the transaction via Binance P2P also I do not think CryptopreneurBrainboss would be able to help the OP. As the site only accept Nigerian bank and if CryptopreneurBrainboss or others wants to help then that would be able to come true if they have the same bank account name as bc.game which might have not.If this be the case, then its only the BC.game customer care that can help with solution on what to do, if OP still have this issue, then i suggest he contact the customer care of the casino, they are the only ones that can proffer real solutions at this point, if they still do not offer solution, then maybe they dont want the money withdrawn.

comments.author: aew
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on November 09, 2022, 04:50:06 AMSo as the title explains - there is a $174 from affiliate commissions sitting in the account:The thing is the site allows to withdraw it only via a local Nigerian bank account - which is something none of us have  There is no option to exchange it.Checking LocalBitcoins - sellers give you 50% worth of Bitcoin for 76,600 NGN, so it's not worth it.One option is to bet with this amount on odds of 6.00 or so in some sports, then bet $1000 on 1.14 or so - hoping the favored outcome will occur and then you withdraw the $1000 + winnings from the other site.But perhaps you guys have better suggestions how to withdraw this?   Last month i had some BRL couldn't withdraw it too . But i clicked BC swap and ibwas able to exchange it to bcd.But today that option is gone can't exchange it . Maybe it's temporary ? And you might use bcswap later ?

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: Try to post it on the Currency Exchange board here maybe someone will want it or asked from one of your friends or family if they have bank accounts that may have options to withdraw it. That's still a good amount of money tbh and shouldn't just go to waste in my opinion.

comments.author: minime0105
comments.body: This particular thread is typically meant to be here, because it involves exchanges and narrowing to a particular country as i seen from the the beginning of the thread, so therefore i believe that placing it gambling section here not even i. Gambling discussion is not obtainable, the best place i may suggest you to drop or move the trade to, is exchanges services and secondly this thread is only going to help people of Nigerian only, because it's emphasizing directly to the benefit of local change of their currency.
